# Data Codebook

## Dataset Information

**Source:** US COVID-19 & Human Mobility (2021)\
**URL:** https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/amroaskar/us-covid-19-and-human-mobility-2021\
**License:** CC0 Public Domain\
**Time Period:** 2021\
**Geographic Level:** US County-level data

## Variables

| Variable | Type | Description |
|----|----|----|
| `date` | Date | Date of observation (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| `county` | Character | County name |
| `state` | Character | US State name |
| `fips` | Character | Federal Information Processing Standard county code |
| `cases` | Numeric | Cumulative COVID-19 cases |
| `deaths` | Numeric | Cumulative COVID-19 deaths |
| `daily_cases` | Numeric | New cases reported on this date |
| `daily_deaths` | Numeric | New deaths reported on this date |
| `day_of_week` | Character | Day name (Monday-Sunday) |
| `is_weekend` | Binary | 1 = Weekend, 0 = Weekday |
| `is_holiday` | Binary | 1 = US Federal Holiday, 0 = Regular day |
| `retail_recreation` | Numeric | \% change in mobility to retail/recreation from baseline |
| `grocery_pharmacy` | Numeric | \% change in mobility to grocery/pharmacy from baseline |
| `parks` | Numeric | \% change in mobility to parks from baseline |
| `transit` | Numeric | \% change in mobility to transit stations from baseline |
| `workplaces` | Numeric | \% change in mobility to workplaces from baseline |
| `residential` | Numeric | \% change in time spent at residential locations from baseline |
| `daily_cases_calc` | Numeric | Calculated daily cases (alternative calculation) |
| `daily_deaths_calc` | Numeric | Calculated daily deaths (alternative calculation) |

## Mobility Data Notes

-   Mobility data sourced from Google Community Mobility Reports
-   Baseline = median value for the corresponding day of the week during Jan 3 - Feb 6, 2020
-   Negative values indicate decrease from baseline; positive values indicate increase
-   Missing values may occur when insufficient data to preserve privacy

## Data Processing

-   Original data downloaded from Kaggle
-   No modifications made to variable values
-   Analysis uses county-aggregated daily data
